capture_comment_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
capture_map_picker_fallback_description:
Interactive map location selection is optimized for mobile devices.
Please use the manual address entry or current location button.
capture_list_no_captures_within_range: No public art captures within 15 miles
capture_comments_no_comments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
capture_detail_terms_required: Please accept the terms and conditions
capture_my_captures_start_capturing_desc: Start capturing art to see your collection here
capture_terms_read_and_accept: Please read and accept our guidelines to ensure safe and legal art capturing
capture_terms_respect_private_property: Respect private property and obtain permission when required
capture_terms_be_mindful: Be mindful of your surroundings and other people
capture_terms_no_restricted_areas: Do not capture in restricted or dangerous areas
capture_terms_right_to_capture: Ensure you have the right to capture and share public art
capture_terms_respect_copyright: Respect copyright and intellectual property rights
capture_terms_safety_bullets:
• Always be aware of your surroundings
• Do not trespass on private property
• Stay on public sidewalks and paths
• Be respectful of other people and property
• Use caution when crossing streets or navigating traffic
• Follow local laws and regulations
capture_terms_legal_bullets:
• Only capture art in public spaces
• No nudity or inappropriate content
• No derogatory or offensive images
• Respect artist copyrights and permissions
• All captures are subject to moderation
• Follow community guidelines and standards
capture_terms_community_description: Your captures help build Art Walks for the community! Each approved capture becomes part of curated routes that guide other users to discover public art. Your contribution helps create a rich map of artistic discoveries.
capture_terms_agreement_text: I have read and agree to all the safety guidelines, legal guidelines, and community standards listed above.
capture_upload_location_permissions_deni: Location permissions are permanently denied, we cannot request permissions.
capture_upload_success_message: Your art has been successfully captured and added to the community.
capture_upload_ready_create_art_walk: Ready to Create an Art Walk?
capture_upload_turn_captures_into_walk: Turn your captures into an amazing art walk experience!
capture_upload_upload_success: Capture uploaded successfully! Rewards are being processed.
capture_dashboard_discover_document: Discover and document public art to help build our community map
capture_dashboard_see_others: See what others are discovering in your area
capture_dashboard_find_artists_subtitle: Search for artists and their captures
capture_dashboard_search_captures_subtit: Find art captures by location or type
capture_admin_content_moderation_delete_: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this capture? This action cannot be undone.
capture_admin_content_moderation_clear_r: Are you sure you want to clear all {count} report(s) from this capture?
